name: T.A.S.Q.U.A.R.E.
description:
Welcome to T.A.S.Q.U.A.R.E!

This is a very basic platformer where you have the TAS-like ability to walk through the game frame-by-frame to perform pixel-perfect maneuvers. Use the game's lenient mechanics to your advantage and do things that shouldn't be possible!

Credits:

Made by 89o

Outline shader by Matharoo

Bloom shader by DukeSoft

Lighting shader by Jobo

Slime sound effects by DrMinky and Archos on FreeSound

Music and level completion sounds by misotanni
